overview: Radford Motors owner and lead designer Mark Stubbs works with master mechanic Ant Anstead, test driver Jenson Button and lawyer Roger Behle to revamp three versions of the classic race car. As the team works to maintain Radford’s British roots, they have to deal with shipping delays, scheduling conflicts, culture clashes, and a rapidly approaching deadline with the goal of bringing Radford’s British heart to the tracks of Monterey, California.
title: Radford Builds
